Zombie 100 ~100 Things I Want to do Before I Become a Zombie~

altTitles.ru: Зомбиапокалипсис и список из 100 дел, что я выполню перед смертью

altTitles.ja: ゾン１００～ゾンビになるまでにしたい１００のこと～

altTitles.ja-ro: Zombie 100 ~Zombie ni Naru Made ni Shitai 100 no Koto~

altTitles.pt-br: Zom 100 - Coisas para fazer antes de virar zumbi

altTitles.ka: Zombie 100 ~ 100 რამ, რაც მინდა გავაკეთო სანამ ზომბი გავხდები ~

description.en:
After three years of working for a black company, Akira was exhausted both mentally and physically.  
But one morning, what he saw on his usual way to work was nothing but a town full of zombies.   
How will the former company slave, Akira, live his life in a world that has completely changed overnight!?  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead** (2023)
description.fr:
Après s'être fait exploiter pendant trois ans dans une entreprise, Akira est épuisé mentalement et physiquement. En se rendant à son travail un matin, il découvre une ville pleine de zombies. Comment l'ancien esclave d'entreprise qu'il était appréhendera sa vie dans un monde qui a complètement changé du jour au lendemain ?  


---

**Links:**  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kosamehal)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/asoharoo)
description.pt-br: Depois de três anos trabalhando para uma empresa exploradora, Akira estava exausto, tanto mentalmente, quanto fisicamente. Mas uma manhã, o que ele viu no caminho habitual para o trabalho não passava de uma cidade cheia de zumbis. Como o ex-escravo da empresa, Akira, viverá sua vida em um mundo que mudou completamente da noite para o dia?

biography.en:
**Name** (in native language)
麻生羽呂

In 2004 Haro Aso was selected to receive Shonen Sunday's Manga College Award for "YUNGE!" In 2007, after the success of his short story, Onigami Amon, Aso got the chance to start a series of his own. In 2008 his series Hyde & Closer was published in Weekly Shonen Sunday.

Once the assistant of [Raiku Makoto](https://mangadex.org/author/a1b60e1e-1d48-4a7a-bc83-6f3998b386ed/raiku-makoto).

[Sugawara Kenji](https://mangadex.org/author/5c2986c9-3ce3-46f3-83ca-dcea147848ed/sugawara-kenji) was his assistant.
